select.if: SELECT province,SUM(device_count) as device_count,avg(proportion) as proportion FROM stat_device_location WHERE sys_user_id = #{sysUserId} AND date_format(ctime,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(#{date},'%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY province

SELECT province,SUM(device_count) as device_count,avg(proportion) as proportion FROM stat_device_location WHERE sys_user_id = #{sysUserId} AND date_format(ctime,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(#{date},'%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY province ORDER BY device_count DESC limit 0,10

mapper.select: insert into stat_device_location(ctime,device_count,sys_user_id,product_id,province) select #{ctime} as ctime, count(d.sno) as device_count ,d.owner_id as sys_user_id ,d.product_id as product_id ,a.province as province from device d,device_launch_area a where d.launch_area_id = a.id and d.is_deleted =0 and d.status !=6 group by d.owner_id,d.product_id,a.province

insert into stat_device_location(ctime,device_count,sys_user_id,product_id,province) select #{ctime} as ctime, count(d.sno) as device_count ,d.owner_id as sys_user_id ,d.product_id as product_id,"其他" as province from device d where d.launch_area_id is null and d.is_deleted =0 and d.status !=6 group by d.owner_id,d.product_id
